code: import axios from'axios';import{BASE_URL}from"../../src/constants/url";import{goToRecipesList}from'../routes/coordinator';export var login=function login(body,clear,history,setRightButtonText){axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/user/login"),body).then(function(res){localStorage.setItem("token",res.data.token);clear();goToRecipesList(history);setRightButtonText("Logout");}).catch(function(err){return alert(err.response.data.message);});};export var signUp=function signUp(body,clear,history,setRightButtonText){axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/user/signup"),body).then(function(res){localStorage.setItem("token",res.data.token);clear();goToRecipesList(history);setRightButtonText("Logout");}).catch(function(err){return console.log("erro no cadastro");});};
